A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good\, but it missed the point of twist and answers. I feel that The Force Awakens was way better. It had a better hype to it. This movie is all over the place\, great sci fi film but doesnt feel much like star wars. Its slow yet fast if that makes sense\, I hope JJ comes back and fixes this problem with episode 9. Good scifi film and space battles but not a great story as far as star wars goes. Ep 1\,2\,3 are better than this.
